explains: adj. 熔化的；铸造的；炽热的
wordGroup: molten metal 熔融金属；熔态金属；金属熔液
molten slag 熔渣；熔化熔渣
molten rock n. 熔岩；熔融岩石
molten glass 玻璃液；熔化玻璃；熔融态玻璃

sentences.en: An immense volume of rocks and molten lava was erupted.
sentences.cn: 大量岩石和熔岩喷发出来。

sentences.en: The volcano spewed a fountain of molten rock 650 feet in the air.
sentences.cn: 这座火山喷射出的熔岩高达650英尺。

sentences.en: A nearby volcano erupted violently, sending out a hail of molten rock and boiling mud.
sentences.cn: 一座附近的火山猛烈爆发，喷出大量熔岩和沸腾的泥浆。
